full_summary:
===============

### English to French and French to English Translation Services for Transport Canada

#### Tender Number and Closing Date

* Tender Number: cb-5309-47020492
* Amendment Number: 9
* Solicitation Number: T8080-220715
* Tender Closing Date: Monday, June 19, 2023, at 14:00:00
* Amendment Date: Monday, June 19, 2023

#### Overview

Transport Canada is seeking translation services for the translation of various documents intended for the general public from English to French and French to English. The selected contractors will work independently to provide translation services on an as-and-when required basis, including evenings and weekends.

#### Translation Services

The contractors selected will offer translation services from English to French and French to English for various documents, with a minimum of four (4) translators available to provide services. The length of translations may vary (mostly between 100 and 5,000 words) and may be requested with short notice and tight turnaround times.

#### Security Streams

The standing offer is for Translation Services that will fall into one (1) of three (3) security streams:

* Stream 1: Unclassified work
* Stream 2: Protected (up to Protected B)
* Stream 3: Classified (Confidential and Secret)

Call ups for Stream 2 and Stream 3 will not be issued until the necessary clearances, verifications and requirements of the Contract Security Program (CSP) are met.

#### Period of the Standing Offer

The term of the Standing Offer will be a two-year period, with two (2) one (1) year option periods.

#### Trade Agreements

The project is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement

#### Additional Information

Transport Canada has attached the tender document for this Request for Standing Offer to provide more detailed information. Bidders should review the document for all requirements and qualifications.

Contact Information
